title: Ukraine Live Updates: ‘Dead Cities’ Become the Focus of Fierce Fighting in the East
author: The New York Times
description: President Volodymyr Zelensky has framed the battle in Sievierodonetsk as pivotal to the broader fight for Donbas. Amid relentless Russian attacks, Ukraine holds on and waits for Western weapons.
content: President Volodymyr Zelensky has framed the battle in Sievierodonetsk as pivotal to the broader fight for Donbas. Amid relentless Russian attacks, Ukraine holds on and waits for Western weapons.

title: Summit Attendees Plan to Commit to Take in More Migrants
author: The New York Times
description: A joint declaration from the U.S. and Latin American countries is expected to be issued Friday to address surging migration rates that have affected the region.
content: A joint declaration from the U.S. and Latin American countries is expected to be issued Friday to address surging migration rates that have affected the region.

title: From the Graveside to the Front, Ukrainians Tell of Grim Endurance
author: Carlotta Gall and Finbarr O’Reilly
description: Ukraine’s casualties in the war against Russia are a closely guarded secret. But those who have been in the trenches along the front line know how relentless the fight has become.
content: Ukraine’s casualties in the war against Russia are a closely guarded secret. But those who have been in the trenches along the front line know how relentless the fight has become.

title: Chinese Pilots Sent a Message. American Allies Said They Went Too Far.
author: Austin Ramzy
description: Australia and Canada said Chinese jets harassed their military planes, though Beijing says it was defending its security. A mishap over Pacific waters could have ominous repercussions.
content: Australia and Canada said Chinese jets harassed their military planes, though Beijing says it was defending its security. A mishap over Pacific waters could have ominous repercussions.

title: Iran Begins to Dismantle Nuclear Program Cameras After Western Criticism
author: Isabella Kwai
description: At a moment when experts say Iran is, again, on the verge of possessing enough fuel for a bomb, the dismantling of U.N. cameras was a sign of worsening prospects for the 2015 deal.
content: At a moment when experts say Iran is, again, on the verge of possessing enough fuel for a bomb, the dismantling of U.N. cameras was a sign of worsening prospects for the 2015 deal.
categories: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament

title: The Racist Researcher Cited in the Buffalo Gunman’s Manifesto
author: Monika Pronczuk and Koba Ryckewaert
description: The work of Michael Woodley, a Briton who was cited by the teenager who killed 10 Black people at a supermarket in Buffalo, included pseudoscientific theories that have been used to justify racism.
content: The work of Michael Woodley, a Briton who was cited by the teenager who killed 10 Black people at a supermarket in Buffalo, included pseudoscientific theories that have been used to justify racism.

title: Naftali Bennett, Israel’s Prime Minister, Visits U.A.E.
author: Isabel Kershner
description: The trip by Naftali Bennett, the Israeli leader, burnishes his foreign policy credentials and provides some distraction from his domestic political troubles.
content: The trip by Naftali Bennett, the Israeli leader, burnishes his foreign policy credentials and provides some distraction from his domestic political troubles.

title: Men Missing in Amazon Faced Threats Before They Disappeared
author: Jack Nicas, Ana Ionova and André Spigariol
description: Dom Phillips, a British journalist, and Bruno Pereira, a Brazilian expert on Indigenous groups, have not been seen since Sunday. They faced threats before they disappeared.
content: Dom Phillips, a British journalist, and Bruno Pereira, a Brazilian expert on Indigenous groups, have not been seen since Sunday. They faced threats before they disappeared.

title: Saudi Arabia’s LIV Golf Series Upends Genteel World of Golf
author: Tariq Panja
description: By promising top players multimillion-dollar paydays, the kingdom moved beyond investing in a sport and made a play to control one. Then the PGA Tour struck back.
content: By promising top players multimillion-dollar paydays, the kingdom moved beyond investing in a sport and made a play to control one. Then the PGA Tour struck back.

title: At Least 7 Killed in Explosion and Fire in Daegu, South Korea
author: Jin Yu Young, John Yoon and Tiffany May
description: A man in his 50s was suspected of setting off the explosion that started the blaze at a law firm’s office in the city of Daegu, the police said. He is believed to have died in the fire.
content: A man in his 50s was suspected of setting off the explosion that started the blaze at a law firm’s office in the city of Daegu, the police said. He is believed to have died in the fire.
